items.sentence: Tom doesn't care how crazy people think he is.
Do you think that I don't know what I'm doing?
Are you sure that that's the best thing to do?
Do you think that you're the only one in pain?
Are you sure that you want to keep doing this?
Somebody told me that Tom now lives in Boston.
My job is to make sure that everybody is safe.
I think that I've figured out how to fix this.
Didn't I tell you that I had it under control?
I think that what you just told me isn't true.
I wish that I was able to tell the difference.
Is it true that you're not allowed to tell me?
Tell me why you think that you can't trust me.
I think that you know which one I like better.
There's nothing that I can do to help you now.
It didn't cost us much to have our barn built.
I thought that you were still studying French.
Tom wasn't able to get the lawn mower started.
You sure do eat a lot of junk food, don't you?
I always drink a cup of coffee in the morning.
I help my mother with the housework every day.
I didn't get any Christmas presents this year.
I shudder at the thought of what might happen.
Is this the first time Tom has ever done this?
Did you turn the light in the living room off?
Tom memorized a short list of very long words.
Tom has a love-hate relationship with his job.
Tom did his best to forget about his troubles.
I'll be getting back home today at about 2:30.
We have the right to refuse service to anyone.
I left the children at home with a babysitter.
Do you have any snacks that we could munch on?
Tom didn't eat any of the cherries I gave him.
You'd probably be able to do that by yourself.
You wouldn't like it if I did that, would you?
You won't be able to do that without our help.
You were tricked into doing that, weren't you?
You were the last one to do that, weren't you?
You were supposed to have done that yesterday.
You were excused from doing that, weren't you?
You thought that we could do that, didn't you?
You thought I'd refuse to do that, didn't you?
You thought I'd already done that, didn't you?
You should be able to do that better than Tom.
You need to ask Tom for permission to do that.
You may be able to talk Tom out of doing that.
You know why Tom wanted to do that, don't you?
You know that Tom wants to do that, don't you?
You know that Tom needs to do that, don't you?
You haven't told Tom why I did that, have you?
